content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The primary process, into which EPAM – Service Desk Processing Center operators are engaged into, is Request fulfillment. As the name suggests, it is aimed to fulfill Service Requests. \\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-family\":null}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-family\":null}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A Service Request is a formal inquiry submitted by a user to get some service, or software, or hardware. Service requests generally refer to something, that the user wants or needs but does not yet have. Many of the service requests are actually small changes – low risk, frequently occurring, low cost, etc. – and affect only the person making a request, or a subordinate group of employees. Examples include password resets, individual PC upgrades, new employee setup, etc.\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-family\":null}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All service requests have similar form structure, but they are divided into three categories, which differ in their workflows and creation of the related tasks:
